snippet: Institutional Shareholder Services is recommending that AOL investors vote for two of three board candidates named by Starboard Value, an activist hedge fund seeking to overhaul the Web company's strategy.
abstract: Institutional Shareholder Services is recommending that AOL investors vote for two of three board candidates named by Starboard Value, an activist hedge fund seeking to overhaul the Web company's strategy.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: I.S.S. Backs Two Starboard Nominees for AOL Board
